summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PWA performance optimization with aggressive client-side caching. All major caching features are working correctly including service worker, IndexedDB chat cache, API response caching, and offline functionality.

minor_issues.issue: CORS preflight response not fully configured for OPTIONS requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality but could be improved

passed_tests: Static asset caching (CSS, JS, fonts) - 13 items cached
API response caching for /api/amenities, /api/events, /api/committee - correct cache headers
Chat groups list caching - IndexedDB with groups, messages, attachments stores
Chat messages caching per group - 24h TTL for attachments
Lazy loading of pages (About, Events, Amenities load on demand)
Backend Cache-Control headers on API responses (public, max-age=300, stale-while-revalidate=3600)
Offline fallback behavior - page loads from cache when offline
Service worker with comprehensive caching strategies
IndexedDB chat cache initialization and functionality
